BootCamP.description: Learn the basics of organizing BOOTCAMPT projects with GPT assistants
details: Start with understanding the principles of BOOTCAMP HACKATHONS project organization
Study syntax, data types, and project structures
Understand features and syntax for week, week-end to bootCamp acme
Write prompts to solve problems or complete specific tasks
Share your code with the Grog community
Ask for feedback and advice to improve your skills and code
